# placemark

**Instance Property**

The location that triggers an event.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var placemark: CLPlacemark { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is set automatically at initialization time and can’t be changed later.

## Getting the Trigger Condition

- **event**: The conditions which trigger an event for the specified location.
- **INSpatialEvent**: Constants indicating when to deliver location-related events.
